title: Na2O2 + S - thermodynamic favorability driven by

content.description: When water is added to a mixture of Na2O2(s) and S(s) , a redox reaction occurs, as represented by the equation below.
content.question: Which of the following statements about the thermodynamic favorability of the reaction at 298 K is correct?

choices.label: It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by ΔS° only.
It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by ΔH° only.
It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by both ΔH° and ΔS°.

content.answer: It is thermodynamically favorable and is driven by ΔH° only.

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
